instructions: Welcome to the 'Add Homework' page! Please follow instructions to effectively assign and manage homework.

fields.label: Title
fields.description: Enter a descriptive title for the homework assignment.

fields.label: Subject
fields.description: Choose the relevant subject from the dropdown menu.

fields.label: Class/Grade
fields.description: Specify the class or grade for which the homework is assigned.

fields.label: Due Date
fields.description: Set the deadline for students to complete the homework.

fields.label: Instructions
fields.description: Provide clear and detailed instructions for the assignment.

fields.label: Attachments
fields.description: If applicable, attach any files or resources necessary for the assignment.

fields.label: Additional Notes
fields.description: Include any extra information or special instructions.

final_note: Remember to review and double-check the details before submitting. This ensures a smooth and organized homework assignment process.
